Have any questions?

What technologies and tools do you specialize in?

I specialize in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React and Nodejs. Additionally, I have experience with CSS preprocessors like SASS, and I am proficient in using version control tools like Git.

Can you provide examples of your previous work?

Yes, you can view my portfolio here which showcases various projects, including responsive websites, single-page applications, and interactive UI components.

How long does it typically take to complete a project?

The timeline for a project depends on its complexity and scope. Generally, a basic website can take 2-4 weeks, while more complex projects might take 2-3 months or more.

Are you open to freelance or contract work?

Yes, I am open to both freelance and contract work. Please reach out to discuss your project requirements and we can determine a suitable arrangement.

What cloud certifications do you hold?

I hold certifications as an AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner and a Google Cloud Digital Leader.

How many internships have you completed?

I completed one internship in June 2023 at IQuadra Information Services, where I focused on AWS services.

Can you describe your role and responsibilities during your internship at IQuadra Information Services?

During my internship at IQuadra Information Services, I worked as an AWS Intern with a focus on security. My main responsibilities included configuring Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies to ensure secure access to AWS resources. I conducted security audits to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities, and implemented monitoring and logging using AWS CloudTrail and CloudWatch to track user activities. I also assisted in implementing data encryption strategies with AWS Key Management Service (KMS) and participated in vulnerability assessments using AWS security tools like Amazon Inspector. This role provided me with valuable hands-on experience in securing AWS environments and applying best practices to protect sensitive data.
